body:
I've managed to successfully install most of these packages on macOS 10.15.6 with Apple Clang 11.0.3 and Ruby 2.7.1. I didn't test some of them that have a lot of non-Ruby dependencies.

This PR has the advantage over #3127 that it doesn't allow `gem` to pull in dependencies from the internet, users have to explicitly list dependencies in the `package.py`.

Closes #16421
Closes #12505
Closes #3127 

@Try2Code @t-brown @marcmengel @mathstuf @DiegoMagdaleno may all be interested in reviewing this PR.
title: Add new RubyPackage build system base class
